= Setup a mapping file in iBatis format = 
in conf/feedserver/sqlmap/ dir, create a mapping file for iBatis.
This mapping file maps Java Object to Database queries on the table/view.

an example:
{{{
     <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
     <!DOCTYPE sqlMap
        PUBLIC "-//ibatis.apache.org//DTD SQL Map 2.0//EN"
        "http://ibatis.apache.org/dtd/sql-map-2.dtd">

     <sqlMap namespace="compplanning_qa">
       <resultMap id="result-contact" class="java.util.HashMap">
         <result property="id" column="id"/>
         <result property="name" column="e"/>
       </resultMap>
 
     <select id="contact-get-feed" resultMap="result-contact">
        select * from contact
     </select>

     <select id="contact-get-entry" resultMap="result-contact">
        select * from contact where id = #id#
       </select>

     <delete id="contact-delete-entry" >
        delete from contact where id = #value#
     </delete>

     <insert id="contact-insert-entry" parameterClass="map">
        insert into contact (name) values (#name#)
       <selectKey keyProperty="id" resultClass="int">
          SELECT last_insert_id()
       </selectKey>
     </insert>

    <update id="contact-update-entry" parameterClass="map">
       update Contact set name = #name# where id = #id#
    </update>

   </sqlMap>
}}}


= Setup xml file with database connection params =
example
{{{
   <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
   <!DOCTYPE sqlMapConfig
      PUBLIC "-//ibatis.apache.org//DTD SQL Map Config 2.0//EN"
      "http://ibatis.apache.org/dtd/sql-map-config-2.dtd">

   <sqlMapConfig>
     <transactionManager type="JDBC" commitRequired="false">
      <dataSource type="SIMPLE">
        <property name="JDBC.Driver" value="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="JDBC.ConnectionURL" value="jdbc:mysql://host:port/dbname"/>
        <property name="JDBC.Username" value="username"/>
        <property name="JDBC.Password" value="password"/>
     </dataSource>
    </transactionManager>
   <sqlMap resource="feedserver/sqlmap/the_above_xml_filename"/>

  </sqlMapConfig>
}}}


= Setup adapter properties file =
create an adapter properties file in conf/feedserver/adapter/ dir.

example
{{{
   feedUri=http://vnori:8080/perfinfo
   adapterClassName=com.google.feedserver.adapter.JdbcAdapter
   sqlMapConfigFile=sqlmap_perfinfo
   title=PerfInfo Feed
   author=Google QA team
}}}
